CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 6, 1952, page 13, reads: "Party Workers - Among those at Table 150 were: Mary Whitlock, Frank Wormick, Ida Daring, Herman Jordan, Helen Norman, Georgia Shefton, Margaret Avery, Tony Upshur, Edna McCrary, Fannie White, and Alfred Ornato. The occasion celebrated the victory of General Dwight D. Eisenhower, who was elected President on Nov. 4, and served to "feel out" the prospects of electing a Republican Mayor of Pittsburgh next year."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait including Mary Whitlock, Frank Wormick, Ida Daring, Herman Jordan, Helen Norman, Georgia Shefton, Margaret Avery, Tony Upshur, Edna McCrary, Fannie White, and Alfred Ornato, seated around banquet table in Syria Mosque for county Republican victory celebration
